actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to repeal the statutes relating to the publishing of cotton price predictions in Government reports and the issuance of cotton crop reports.

summary.text: Repeals specified Acts which: (1) prescribe special cotton crop and acreage reports; and (2) prohibit the publication of cotton price predictions. Subjects cotton to only the general reporting requirements established for other agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the statutes relating to the publishing of cotton price predictions in Government reports and the issuance of cotton crop reports.
